V02prmosu_u:465_0: mā bhagavantaṃ vivada mā bhagavantam abhyākhyāhi na sādhu bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ

V02prmosu_u:962: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā ca saṃvaraḥ
V02prmosu_u:963: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ
V02prmosu_u:973: kṣiptaḥ kṣipen naiva hato na hanyād
V02prmosu_u:982: atra sagauravā buddhā buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye
V02prmosu_u:988: dhunadhvaṃ mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ 13
V02prmosu_u:990: yo hy asmiṃ dharmavinaye apramatto bhaviṣyati
V02prmosu_u:993: yasyārth(e) sūtram uddiṣṭaṃ yasyārthe poṣathaḥ kṛtaḥ
V02prmosu_u:996: uddiṣṭa(ḥ) prātimokṣaḥ kṛtaḥ samagreṇa saṃghena poṣatha iti //
